document_data.caption: A map showing Shalass Road.
document_data.name: Shalass Road
document_data.mainbody: '''Shalass Road''' was a small roadway found in western [[Sembia]] that connected [[Daerlun]] in the north with [[Urmlaspyr]] in the south.
document_data.Description: Shalass Road originated in Urmlaspyr on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], passing northwest from the city to connect with Daerlun on the [[Way of the Manticore]].
